remarks: A lemma used to simplify cofinality computations, showing the existence of the cardinal of an unbounded subset of a set ` A ` .  (Contributed by NM, 24-Apr-2004.)
statement:
cflem $p |- ( A e. V -> E. x E. y ( x = ( card ` y ) /\ ( y C_ A /\ A. z e. A E. w e. y z C_ w ) ) ) $.
$d A w x y z $.
